text: "Snow on the Sahara" is a 1997 song by French-Indonesian singer Anggun and is the title track to her English debut album Snow on the Sahara. It went to number 1 in Malaysia and Italy, number 16 in France and number 184 in the United Kingdom. == Track listing == #"Snow on the Sahara" (4:20) #"Selamanya" (2:21) #"La Neige au Sahara" (4:20) ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Debut singles
title: Snow on the Sahara (song)
